name: The Looper Encounter
description:
HINTS:

  • Shoot enemies to stun them, they’ll stop moving and shooting, so they’re easier to capture.
  • Get as many enemies at once as you can, there’s a score multiplier!
  • Live enemies are worth more points than stunned ones, but it’s riskier to catch moving/shooting targets
  • You die after 10 hits, so it might be worth sacrificing a hit to get a good capture combo!
